definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: This paper studies the primary bronchogenic carcinoma pathogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究原发性支气管肺癌的病因病机。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of diaphragm activity range to foreign body transmitted X-rays in bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价横膈动度对透X线性支气管异物的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Anaphylaxis, as discussed earlier in the week, may also present with bronchoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 如前讨论所述，过敏反应也可出现支气管收缩。

sentences.english: Flexible bronchoscope diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 儿童支原体肺炎的纤维支气管镜诊治研究。

sentences.english: Conclusion GKC is effective in treating chronic bronchitis in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 结论固本咳喘胶囊治疗老年慢性支气管炎疗效确切。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the misdiagnosis causes and the early diagnosis of primary bronchogenic carcinoma(PBC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性支气管肺癌的误诊原因及早期诊断。

sentences.english: The atelectasis caused by bronchiectasis was usually found in elder children.
sentences.chinese: 支气管扩张所致肺不张多发生在较大儿童。

sentences.english: Significant differences between the bronchial asthma and the repeated respiratory infections were found.
sentences.chinese: 发现支气管哮喘和反复呼吸道感染之间差别显著。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Qingfeifang in treating cough.
sentences.chinese: 观察清肺定哮方加减治疗婴幼儿毛细支气管炎的效果。

sentences.english: Sections of the lungs at this stage would show larvae in the bronchioles.
sentences.chinese: 这时候肺部切片可显示细支气管内有蛔蚴。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of treatment based syndrome differentiation for bronchial asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中医疗法辨证治疗支气管哮喘的疗效。

sentences.english: The utility model is applicable to the administration for bronchiole and pulmonary alveolar.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型可用于毛细支气管及肺泡的给药。

sentences.english: After in hospital, inspects discovered that what the baby contracts is the pneumococcal bronchopneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 入院后检查发现宝宝患的是肺炎球菌性支气管肺炎。

sentences.english: Oat bran was porphyrizd into cell-level ultramicro-power.
sentences.chinese: 正沿支气管蔓延的燕麦细胞癌。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Injectio Salviae Miltiorrhizae Composita, as add-on treatment of bronchiolitis of newborn, has a good efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 结论复方丹参辅佐治疗新生儿毛细支气管炎疗效明显。

sentences.english: A fungus ball composed of blue-staining hyphal elements of Aspergillus is seen here in a bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 支气管处可见由蓝色的菌丝构成的真菌球。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
